message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I think that's a fair price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is cutting it a bit close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can only go up to $12,750. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $12,750 is tough, but I'm willing to accept that price if you can close the deal today.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $12,750, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm really close to my budget, and I'd like to save as much as possible.
